occupation: Director of Marketing Communications - The Joule Hotel at Highgate
headline: Director of Marketing | Luxury & Lifestyle Hotels
summary:
Highly creative, motivated and versatile hospitality leader with 10+ years of experience in marketing communications, social media strategy and brand activations & programming. Proven track record for successfully developing and launching multi-layered marketing campaigns that drive revenue, engagement and brand awareness.

Graduated with a Bachelor of Arts degree from Baylor University where I studied Journalism, Public Relations & New Media as well as Marketing & Management. Especially skilled at collaborating with community leaders, media and strategic partners to amplify the voice and vision of the brand.

experiences.title: Director of Marketing Communications - The Joule Hotel
Director of Marketing
experiences.description: Develop and launch on-going yearly, quarterly, and monthly marketing strategies to ensure success and achieved budgeted revenues through a multi-layered marketing strategy - from curating special room packages and partnerships to organic/paid digital media and public relations. Oversee Marketing Manager development and tasks.

experiences.title: Area Director of Marketing
experiences.description:
As a department head and executive committee member, I develop strategic plans for all marketing, event and public relations ensuring full maximization of revenue potential and media visibility for Grapevine Main (Hotel Vin, Autograph Collection and Harvest Hall, European Food Hall) as well as Persimmons Bar & Grill located on Grapevine Golf Course. Find and facilitate the fulfillment of all strategic partnership elements, digital/social, community, and hospitality. I oversee daily duties of a Social Media Manager and a Marketing Specialist. 

As part of my duties for the entire Grapevine Main campus, I also lead the Grapevine Main Marketing Committee which encompasses Hotel Vin, Harvest Hall, Grapevine Convention & Visitors Bureau Executive Team and Grapevine Parks and Recreation facilitating citywide celebrations, event programming and activations.

experiences.title: Social Media Manager
experiences.description:
Managed multiple entertainment, hospitality, and lifestyle client accounts by creating content calendars with original copy and photography, as well as engaging with fans on multiple platforms, running social media ads, and reporting through Sprout Social. 

Defined and maintained online voice for brands including The Historic Pearl, Hotel Emma, Southerleigh Fine Food & Brewery, Bottling Department Food Hall and Cellars at Pearl.

experiences.title: Marketing Events Manager
experiences.description:
Responsible for planning, implementing, and managing over 200 marketing programs and functions throughout the entire resort with emphasis on the creation, design and execution of special events, activities and promotions. Assisted with creative development and writing copy for new promotions, year-round special events, theme weekends, seasonal festivals and celebrations. 

Duties also included cultivating relationships with local groups and community leaders to develop event sponsorship, brand activation and marketing collaboration.

experiences.title: Marketing Specialist - Retama Park Race Track
experiences.description:
Managed and designed all internal and external advertising, interactive marketing, social media and public relations processes in support of revenue goals/requirements. Assisted in the development and execution of the marketing plan in relation to the yearly budget. Conceptualized, planned and implemented promotions and events. Point of contact for media representatives and sponsors. Worked with Pinnacle team members across the country to implement corporate initiatives and communication.

Grew Facebook presence by 83% and increased guest engagement by over 200% in less than two years, as well as, establishing Twitter and Instagram as a media platform. In addition to growing the audience, I repositioned the propertyâ€™s site by establishing comprehensive and engaging content for all users while being strategically in line with the business and brand.

experiences.title: Editorial Intern
experiences.description: Wrote monthly magazine articles each month, confirmed sales, organized layouts and coordinated photography for each issue. Interviewed community members and produced stories consisting of up to 2,000 words. Helped in execution of all fashion photo shoots, including meeting with clients and selecting retail.

experiences.title: Marketing And Public Relations Intern
experiences.description: Wrote press releases for upcoming events by interviewing city officials. Established Twitter as a media platform for blood services.
